algorithm_technique: iterative search for factors starting from square root
problem_summary_simple: Find length and width of a rectangle with given area, minimizing the difference between them.
problem_summary_technical: Find the largest factor of 'area' that is less than or equal to its square root.
key_insights: to minimize difference, factors should be close to sqrt(area)
start checking factors from sqrt(area) downwards
the first factor found will be the largest possible width
